data.title: Mealtime with J.R. Smith, Maurice Orr, Harry Shuford, Bill Tipton, Cecil Colville and Bob Turner, Pasadena, 1935
data.meta_description: Access to this collection is generously supported by Arcadia funds.The six men occupy one side of a table covered in a white tablecloth. They all have napkins and cutlery in front of their places and some of them raise glasses to drink.Photograph appears with the headline, "How Stanford and S.M.U. Players Spend Their Spare Time Before the Battle," Los Angeles Times, 29 Dec 1935: A15.Text from negative sleeve: 4336 - Billy Stamps. Johnny Weissmuller Harry Shuford Arthur Johnson John Sprage John Stuffleborne Loamon Phillips Shelly Burt J R Smith Maurice Orr Bill Tipton Cecil Colville Bob Turner S.M.U Team at Hotel Scenes 12-28-35. [stamped:] Jan 3-1936Handwritten on negative: L2R J.R. Smith x Maurice Orr x Harry Shuford x Bill Tipton x Cecil Colville x Bob Turner of S.M.U. 12-28-35Text from newspaper caption: WHEN THEY'RE NOT ON THE FOOTBALL FIELD HERE'S WHERE MUSTANGS SHINE BEST Football players like to eat when they're not playing football. And here are the Southern Methodist players in "action." Left to right: J. R. Smith, Maurice Orr, Harry Shuford, Bill Tipton, Cecil Colville and Bob Turner. Smith, Shuford and Turner are backs. Orr is a tackle while Tipton and Colville hold down end positions.
